entry.title: Moonshot
entry.summary:
Author: Petroica

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,887Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 0

Summary: After dropping out of college Stiles didn't have much reason to stay in New York, but he had even less reason to go back to Beacon Hills. At least here he had a small apartment, a job that paid just enough, and he got to live in the same city as the Mets - more specifically, their suspiciously mediocre catcher and hometown anti-hero, Derek Hale.

entry.title: Yellow Paper Daisy
entry.summary:
Author: Babysterek

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 50,778Chapters: 17/?Kudos: 123

Summary: “Well,” Peter says at last, forcing a crooked smile into his voice, “at least this time he didn’t almost get us all killed.”Derek swallows. His throat is dry, the words scraping on the way out. “I was drunk.” They land and disappear without effect. Talia turns then, her gaze settling on him fully. It’s steady, unreadable, and it makes his shoulders tense despite himself. “You were careless,” she says. “You are a werewolf, and if you got drunk, you laced it with wolfsbane, you did it. Do you understand, In twenty-four years, every scandal has had the same root. You. At some point, it stops being bad luck and becomes character. And I am tired of pretending this is something that merely happens to you.” --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Derek just wanted a moment of quiet. Instead, he crosses a line with the last person he should trust.....old grudges, bad decisions and a mistake he keeps repeating. "He learned the shape of the poison once, from a woman who wore it like skin. Now hemlock blooms in his own hands, and he cannot tell where she ends and he begins. "

entry.title: Run Boy Run
entry.summary:
Author: myswordhandissinging

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,647Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 712

Summary: Stiles Stilinski knew he should have stayed in to finish his assignment that was due on Monday. Instead, he had to go investigate with the pack. He knew he was going to regret it later, and he probably should have listened to his instincts. When he goes missing, the pack finds him in the same spot after days of searching.   Or the one where Stiles goes missing for a couple of days and comes back blind and with magical powers. What did that bitch do to him?   *This was first published in 2013 as a teenager. Now, as an adult with a developed frontal lobe, the age difference between Derek and Stiles is only 2 years, with Stiles as an 18-year-old high school senior and Derek being 20-years-old.

But he is more powerful than he knows, more connected to the Nemeton than anyone can guess, and a group of kids, teenagers and adults wakes up in the middle of the night ten years earlier with a second chance they didn't know they needed and a bond they don't understand. entry.title: Chaos Come Again
entry.summary:
Author: SierraStyx

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 92,531Chapters: 32/?Kudos: 1,100

Summary: Stiles has a good life. He has a great job, a great husband, and he's happy in Virginia. The pack is doing fine under Scott's leadership back in California. Aside from the grisly murder scenes he sees on cases, Stiles' life is actually pretty perfect. Which is of course, when everything goes wrong.Basically Stiles is part of the BAU team, and the Nogitsune returns. Mind games ensue. There are not nearly enough crossovers where Stiles is on the team, so idk here you go, brought to you by the voices in my head. Also in this fic Stiles and Derek didn't get together until Stiles was well into college, because I think canon-era Stiles/Derek is really creepy.

entry.title: can't handle the haunting
entry.summary:
Author: sparassiss

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,304Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 20

Summary: “Perhaps you’d like to expand on how you feel you’re a burden to your husband?” Oof. Derek’s stomach clenches again painfully of its own accord, as Barbara hits the nail on the head. Fuck it, he thinks, completely over himself already and his trepidation. He glances at himself in the little window on the screen that shows his anxious murder brows and colored cheeks, the dark loft in the background, Stiles’ red hoodie draped haphazardly over the arm of the couch, mugs from their morning coffee left out on the table alongside a stray newspaper.  The thought of Stiles, predictably, loosens his stomach a fraction, just enough so he can breathe a bit better.  So he talks; he talks for Stiles. -- Or, Derek goes to his first therapy session to talk about his mysterious stomachaches and guilt, but not without anxiety.

entry.title: A Flower Made Of Iron
entry.summary:
Author: XOLissy

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,248,049Chapters: 39/?Kudos: 58

Summary: Eden Parker has learned how to survive by staying soft in a world that punishes it. Adopted young, raised in the quiet fractures of Mystic Falls, and carrying truths no one else can see, Eden moves through life balancing grief, loyalty, and a dangerous kind of hope. He loves deeply. He trusts carefully. And he has no idea how many forces—human and otherwise—are already watching him. When new friendships form, old wounds reopen, and the supernatural begins to bleed into the ordinary, Eden finds himself at the center of something far larger than a high-school existence should allow. Monsters lurk in forests and shadows. Love arrives when it shouldn’t. Protection becomes complicated. And the past—buried, sealed, and forgotten—refuses to stay quiet. Some bonds are chosen. Some are fated. And some are forged in pain, blood, and devotion. Disclaimer: I do not own the Vampire Diaries, Supernatural, Teen Wolf, Smallville, or The Originals. I do not own any of the characters besides Eden Parker and Ben Monroe. All rights reserved to the writers.

entry.title: Conceptual Mage
entry.summary:
Author: DaoOfGay

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,860Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 54

Summary: After suddenly getting better at LaCrosse, getting to date Allison Argent, and sit at the popular kids table, Scott didn't have any more time for him. Stiles is a bit lonely, but he finally decides to ditch Scott on the day of his mother's death, when Scott doesn't come with him to the cemetery. The next day he thinks he's going crazy because he sees floating symbols on things and every time he stares at them, he gets a word shoved into his head. He almost freaks out until he writes down the symbol for [Light], and his entire room starts to glow. Then he starts seeing these holes in some places, and suddenly he is somewhere else, and there's various of these breaches everywhere. So fuck Scott McCall, this summer vacation, Stiles has something new to explore.
